abstract: LG cellphone engineers spend hours weekly driving around the country to test what kind of reception LG phones have on various networks.
snippet: LG cellphone engineers spend hours weekly driving around the country to test what kind of reception LG phones have on various networks.
lead_paragraph: While fashion seemed to be the order of the day at the CTIA Wireless 2008 show in Las Vegas this week – even Georgio Armani had its own branded phone – some at the wireless industry’s largest trade show were focused more on the basics, like whether a phone actually worked well on a Verizon Wireless or AT&T network.
